name: lyrics-finder
author: Rahil Kabani <rahil.kabani.4@gmail.com>
description: A Simple Lyrics Finder That Just Works!

scripts.releasepatch: git add . && git commit -m 'update' --allow-empty && npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.releaseminor: git add . && git commit -m 'update' --allow-empty && npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.releasemajor: git add . && git commit -m 'update' --allow-empty && npm version major && git push && npm publish
